1.0.0.name: wordpress/page-list-widget
1.0.0.description:
This is a widget plugin. This widget will display a list of pages.

  • This widget displays only page.
  • You can change sort order.
  • You can display/hide updated date.
  • You can include some pages from all pages.
  • You can exclude some pages from the list.
  • If you want to translate this plugin, you put '*.mo' in 'languages' directory. Japanese language file is included in this plugin.
